Federico Bogovic

Buenos Aires · Argentina · Email: fede@bogovic.ar

I’m a Software Engineer specializing in Backend and Software Architecture , with expertise in microservices , cloud-native solutions , and DevOps . I deliver scalable solutions across banking and enterprise software industries, focusing on resilient architectures, high-volume systems, serverless and seamless REST/SOAP API integrations.

With a strong background in CI/CD pipelines, automation , and quality assurance, I leverage AWS and Kubernetes to optimize backend performance, security , and scalability . I bring expertise in database design , messaging architectures , and security standards, excelling at migrations , integrations and transitions of legacy systems to modern architectures.

WSO2

Facilitated the adoption and use of WSO2 cloud technologies for global customers. Managed complex technical issues and coordinated with multiple engineering teams for escalations. Delivered custom features, technical consultancy, and training on WSO2 solutions.

March 2024 - Present

Sr. Architect Software Engineer

Credicoop Bank

Designed RESTful APIs for core banking operations, integrating external APIs and databases. Led the integration of QR payments and facial recognition features. Actively participated in code reviews and architectural decisions.

Jan 2023 - Feb 2024

Exo Mindset / IncluIT

Contributed to the migration of a legacy case management system to a modern technology stack and architecture. Participated in ERD and architecture desings. Developed key backend features across multiple squads. Led integrations of SSO and Jasper Reports, and contributed to legacy system migrations. Implemented microservices and handled maintenance across various platforms.

Jun 2022 - Jan 2023

Java Developer

Tecnosoftware (Software Factory)

Participated in the migration of a bank's monolithic ESB to a microservices architecture. Developed microservices, handled API integrations, and supported on-call maintenance.

Interests

Outside of my work as a Software Engineer, I enjoy swimming in a 50m Olympic pool and playing football with friends. Additionally, I love trekking in nature, visiting museums, and relaxing at coffee shops, where I often explore the latest tech advancements.

When forced indoors, I'm also an avid gamer and spend time exploring new video games, staying updated with the latest developments in the gaming world. I have a strong passion for blockchain technology and its potential to revolutionize various industries.
